text: "Gimme All Your Lovin'" is a 1983 song by ZZ Top. It is the leading single from their eighth studio album Eliminator. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 37 in the United States, number 3 in the Netherlands, number 9 in Ireland, number 82 in Australia, number 19 in France and number 39 in Canada. It has been covered by Lonestar and Filter. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Lonestar songs Category:Filter (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Gimme All Your Lovin'
